title: Error with startup launcher message
body:
"Failed to load URL "https://riot:V5DD8gSQgQag_TlUfQb6tA@127.0.0.1:2049/index.html" with error "ERR_UNSAFE_PORT" (-312)."

This message is displayed when starting up launcher, but instead of the usual login screen, it's completely blank white with the above message.

replies.body: The background of the login screen is pulled from our servers, so there's a pretty good chance that your network isn't able to get that information for some reason. I'd suggest looking over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if you could update anything there.
